mentionedBy.name: CommVault Systems Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Market leader in enterprise backup software following the Symantec-Veritas merger in July 2005. NetBackup was Veritas's flagship product and maintained dominance in the enterprise backup market.

2005.note: Market leader in enterprise backup software following the Symantec-Veritas merger in July 2005. NetBackup was Veritas's flagship product and maintained dominance in the enterprise backup market.
